Package org.cojen.tupl.ext

Interface ReplicationManager.Writer

    • Method Detail

      • position

        long position​()
        Returns the next position a leader will write to. Valid only if local instance is the leader.

      • confirmedPosition

        long confirmedPosition​()
        Returns the current confirmed log position.

      • leaderNotify

        boolean leaderNotify​(Runnable callback)
        Invokes the given callback upon a leadership change. Callback should be invoked at most once, but extra invocations are ignored.
        Returns:
        false if not leader

      • write

        boolean write​(byte[] b,
              int off,
              int len,
              long commitPos)
       throws IOException
        Fully writes the given data, returning a potential confirmation position. When the local instance loses leadership, all data rolls back to the highest confirmed position.

        An optional commit parameter defines the highest log position which immediately follows a transaction commit operation. If leadership is lost, the message stream is guaranteed to be truncated at a position no higher than the highest commit position ever provided. The given commit position is ignored if it's higher than what has actually been written.

        Parameters:
        b - message buffer
        off - message buffer offset
        len - message length
        commitPos - highest transaction commit position; pass 0 if nothing changed
        Returns:
        false if not leader
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if commitPos is negative
        IOException

      • confirm

        default boolean confirm​(long commitPos)
                 throws IOException
        Blocks until all data up to the given log position is confirmed.
        Parameters:
        commitPos - commit position which was passed to the write method
        Returns:
        false if not leader at the given position
        Throws:
        ConfirmationFailureException
        IOException

      • confirm

        boolean confirm​(long commitPos,
                long timeoutNanos)
         throws IOException
        Blocks until all data up to the given log position is confirmed.
        Parameters:
        commitPos - commit position which was passed to the write method
        timeoutNanos - pass -1 for infinite
        Returns:
        false if not leader at the given position
        Throws:
        ConfirmationFailureException
        IOException

      • confirmEnd

        default long confirmEnd​()
                 throws ConfirmationFailureException
        Blocks until the leadership end is confirmed. This method must be called before switching to replica mode.
        Returns:
        the end commit position; same as next read position
        Throws:
        ConfirmationFailureException - if end position cannot be determined

      • confirmEnd

        long confirmEnd​(long timeoutNanos)
         throws ConfirmationFailureException
        Blocks until the leadership end is confirmed. This method must be called before switching to replica mode.
        Returns:
        the end commit position; same as next read position
        Throws:
        ConfirmationFailureException - if end position cannot be determined
